bill.summary:
Putting Students First Act
This bill establishes an Education Recoupment Trust Fund to recover misused elementary and secondary education funds for the benefit of the affected students. The fund shall include amounts collected by the federal government pursuant to a judgment or settlement related to such misused funds.
